entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
